headline: Broadcom Wi-Fi 8 Launch Targets AI Ready Enterprise Network Upgrades
summary: Broadcom (NasdaqGS:AVGO) has launched what it calls the industry's first Wi-Fi 8 access point and switch solution for enterprise networks. The new platform introduces unified architecture, AI-ready networking features, extensive telemetry and analytics, and MACsec security across all switch ports and access points. This represents a material operational and technology update for Broadcom as enterprises prepare for next generation AI-driven applications. Broadcom is rolling out Wi-Fi 8...

headline: This Week In AI Chips - India Boosts AI Capabilities with AMD and TCS Partnership
summary: AMD and Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) have strengthened their collaboration to launch the “Helios” rack-scale AI architecture in India, supporting the country's AI initiatives and sovereign AI factories. This new 200MW deployment aims to accelerate AI adoption at scale across various industries by offering a training and inference platform designed to enhance operational efficiency and reduce time-to-deployment. Featuring AMD's Instinct™ MI455X GPUs, next-generation EPYC™ CPUs, and...

headline: 1 of Wall Street’s Favorite Stock Worth Your Attention and 2 We Question
summary: The stocks in this article have caught Wall Street’s attention in a big way, with price targets implying returns above 20%. But investors should take these forecasts with a grain of salt because analysts typically say nice things about companies so their firms can win business in other product lines like M&A advisory.
